subject: Automobile Racing
Robberies and Thefts
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Travis Kvapil’s Nascar Sprint Cup car was stolen early Friday from a hotel parking lot in Morrow, Ga., leading him to withdraw from a race this weekend.
snippet: Travis Kvapil’s Nascar Sprint Cup car was stolen early Friday from a hotel parking lot in Morrow, Ga., leading him to withdraw from a race this weekend.
